::: {.callout-note}
This website was created as part of the university course  
**"Topics in Cognitive Psychology: Psychological Interventions Using Digital Technologies"** at the **[{{< glossary "University of Graz" >}}](glossary.qmd#University of Graz) ** (Summer Semester 2025). 

It was created using **[{{< glossary Quarto >}}](glossary.qmd#Quarto)**, and published on **[{{< glossary GitHub >}}](glossary.qmd#GitHub)**.

The main goal is to **summarize and present a [{{< glossary meta-analysis >}}](glossary.qmd#meta-analysis)** conducted during the course.  
Additionally, each participant selected an individual study from the meta-analysis and included it here.

This was our goal: [Benchmark Website](https://www.clearinghouse.edu.tum.de/spielbasiertes-lernen/spielbasiertes-lernen-und-motivation/){target="_blank"}


:::

## How to Use This Website

## Selected Studies

### Meta-Analysis Chosen:
**Ahmed Tlili, Michael Agyemang Adarkwah, Soheil Salha, Juan Garzón, Kinshuk & Daniel Burgos (2024)**  
*The effect of educational mobile games on learning performance: a meta-analysis and research synthesis,* Interactive Learning Environments, 32:10, 7278-7300, [DOI: 10.1080/10494820.2024.2310135](https://doi.org/10.1080/10494820.2024.2310135){target="_blank"}

### Individual Studies Selected:

- **Chang, C. Y., Chung, M. H., & Yang, J. C. (2022)**  
  Facilitating nursing students’ skill training in distance education via online game-based learning with the watch-summarize-question approach during the COVID-19 pandemic: A quasi-experimental study. *Nurse Education Today, 109*, 105256. [https://doi.org/10.1016/j.nedt.2021.105256](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.nedt.2021.105256){target="_blank"}

- **Wang, S. Y., Chang, S. C., Hwang, G. J., & Chen, P. Y. (2018)**  
  A microworld-based role-playing game development approach to engaging students in interactive, enjoyable, and effective mathematics learning. *Interactive Learning Environments, 26(3)*, 411–423.  
  [https://doi.org/10.1080/10494820.2017.1337038](https://doi.org/10.1080/10494820.2017.1337038){target="_blank"}


:::
